title: B. Gnikool Ssalg
statement: You are given a string. Reverse its characters.
inputSpecification: The only line of input contains a string between 1 and 100 characters long. Each character of the string has ASCII-code between 33 (exclamation mark) and 126 (tilde), inclusive.
outputSpecification: Output the characters of this string in reverse order.
name: Gnikool Ssalg
